short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Etsy customer data to csv

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily extract and download valuable data like customer email, name, product, amount, address, communication history from your Etsy store and unlock new marketing opportunities. 

With this tool, you can effortlessly export and download Etsy emails, order and customer details to a csv and transform into any format that's perfect for analysis and insights. You have the option to download all time emails and orders the first time subsequently choose orders between a date range to keep up with recent emails.

Use this data to:

1. Segment your customers and tailor your marketing campaigns
2. Gain deeper insights into your business performance
3. Analyze sales trends to identify growth opportunities

To avoid timeouts and failed exports for large shops, Export Etsy Emails+Orders exports 5 pages at a time and automatically clicks through the rest of pages. You can download all that customer data in one csv file at the end. 

Boost your marketing effectiveness and simplify your data management and with Export Etsy Emails+Orders. You will have access to customer support to help you download orders and emails in case of issues.
